participant_1.background:
I'm child-free, but I love my niece and nephew.
My family is my biggest treasure.
I am worried that my family would not accept me if I told them I was gay.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.
I enjoy the outdoors and take pride in my heritage.

participant_2.background:
I'd love to take my kids to the ballet in air conditioning.
I always end up staring at my antique collection for hours.
i like pizza.
I wake up early, spend time with my family, and work hard to provide for them.
I have not been in a fight, but I've seen my sister in one.

content.text: Hello! I'm good. How are you?
I'm doing well. I'm excited to go to the ballet tonight!
That's great! I love the ballet. I'd love to take my kids to see one someday.
That's a great idea. I'm sure they would love it.
Thanks! I've always been a fan of the arts. I love going to museums and art galleries too.
I love those things too. I actually have a huge collection of antique furniture and paintings.
That's amazing! I love antiques. I have a small collection of antique books.
That's awesome! I love books too. I have a whole library in my house.
Wow! That's incredible. I wish I had a library in my house.
It's great. I love spending time reading in there.
That's amazing. I love to read too. I usually read for a few hours every night before I go to bed.
That's a great habit. I should do that more often.
It's really relaxing. I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too. I love getting lost in a good story.
